#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int MOD = 1e9+7;
bool visited[100005];
vector<int> v[100005];
long long cur = 0;
int col[100005];
void dfs(int u) {
    visited[u] = 1;
    cur++;
    for(int i = 0; i < v[u].size(); i++ ) {
        if(!visited[v[u][i]] && col[v[u][i]]==1-col[u]) {
            dfs(v[u][i]);
        }
    }
}
int main() {
    int n;cin>>n;
    for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++) {
        int x,y;
        cin>>x>>y;
        v[x].push_back(y);
        v[y].push_back(x);
    }
    long long  ans = 0;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) {
        char ch[21];
        scanf("%s",ch);
        if(ch[0]=='W') {
            col[i]=1;
        }
        else {
            col[i]=0;
        }
    }
    for(int i = 1;i<=n; i++ ){
        cur = 0;
        if(!visited[i]) {
            dfs(i);
        }
        ans+=(cur*(cur+1))/2;
        ans%=MOD;
    }
    cout<<ans<<endl;
}
